tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Namrata completed removable complete denture within the specific time. From extraction to fixing no problem faced. She listens problem very calmly and attend it immediately . I am fully satisfied with the treatment . After treatment, whenever required she cured the problem. I am thankful to her .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had severe pain and swelling with my upper back tooth. Dr Sirse Namrata explained everything. She started with medicines first and then completed the root canal. I also got my badly damaged molar. I didn't even realize the extraction & it was done in 5 minutes,whole procedure was do r so efficiently in glad to dr namrata thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had ended up here after severe teeth pain, Dr Namratha did the x-ray and suggested to do RCT which will two sitting process. Soon after 1st sitting my pain was completely subside. Dr mahantesh was available in practo for any questions for next three days and given my anxious nature I had asked him couple of questions which he promptly replied. Second sitting went well too and my teeth size was taken for Crowns, I was again called after 6 days for crown fitting and it's been 1 month now and I do not have any problems.
